author: pipermerriam
content:
Did we ever settle on specifically which EIP is going to be the one for history expiry:

- https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-4444 well known and has the correct branding, however, it is specified as a rolling window of 1 year which is not accurate for what we are about to do.
- https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7639 is accurate in specifying what is happening with clients dropping history with Pectra.

Anyone have opinions?
